text: An electric utility is a company in the electric power industry (often a public utility). This kind of company does electricity generation and distribution of electricity for sale generally in a regulated market. The electrical utility industry is a major provider of energy in most countries. Electric utilities are facing increasing demands By Candace Lombardi, CNET. “Utilities: Green tech good for planet, bad for business .” February 23, 2010. including aging infrastructure, reliability, and regulation. ==References== Category:Energy
